title: Warm Knits Cool Gifts

With shawls to wrap up in, hats to pull over our ears, wool sweaters to keep us warm, and ornaments for the tree, autumn and winter lend themselves to knitting in a way like no other time of the yearÃ¯Â¿Â½and no one knows that better than knitting superstars Sally Melville and Caddy Melville Ledbetter. The luminous photography and clear and thorough instructions make each project an irresistible must-knit, and the options for adding personal touches are endless. Plus their signature Fit & Flatter tips and special Techniques callouts break down instructions step-by-step, making you a more informed, thoughtful, and intuitive knitter year-round.
